title: Should we change our editing delay on the funding cycles from 7 days to 3 days?
body:
Context:
With the new 8 days process (from idea to execution) we're trying to implement on governance, the 7 day delays we have on changing configuration for the next cycle can be unhealthy for the discussions to actually be meaningfull, for they would have to happen in FC#X to be implemented on FC#X+2. That's because the FCs have 15 days, the on-testing governance cycle has 8 and the delay is 7. 

Proposal:
Change the reconfiguration stategy delay on JuiceboxDAO project in Juicebox protocol from 7 days to 3 days, starting on FC#4
author: 0xf7253A0E87E39d2cD6365919D4a3D56D431D0041
